name: kGenProg
description: automated program repair tool written in Java for Java

name: kPAR
description: Java implementation of PAR: fixing Java bugs with pre-defined fix patterns

name: AVATAR
description: fixing Java bugs by the fix patterns of static analysis violations (FindBugs violations)

name: BugZoo
description: a platform for studying historical software bugs

name: Repairnator
description: software development bot that automatically repairs build failures on Travis Continuous Integration

name: LSRepair
description: fixing Java bugs by leveraging live search of fix ingredients of similar code at method level

name: SketchFix
description: automatic program repair with on-demand candidate generation

name: Footpatch
description: static automated program repair for heap properties

name: SimFix
description: fixing Java bugs by leveraging existing patches and similar code

name: JAID
description: an APR technique that uses detailed state abstractions to guide both fault localization and fix generation

name: JFix
description: semantics-based repair framework for Java programs

name: DeepFix
description: tool for fixing common programming errors based on deep learning

name: ACS
description: automated program repair tool with accurate condition synthesis

name: NPEFix
description: system that generates patches for Null Pointer Exceptions with meta-programming

name: Genesis
description: system that automatically infers sets of code transforms for automatic patch generation

name: CoderAssist
description: system for feedback generation

name: AllRepair
description: mutation-based repair tool for C programs equipped with assertions in the code

name: Astor
description: automatic software repair framework for Java (incl. GenProg, Kali and mutation repair for Java)

name: HistoricalFix
description: automated program repair tool that leverages bug fix history

name: Angelix
description: automated program repair tool based on symbolic analysis

name: Prophet
description: automated program repair that learns from correct patches

name: SearchRepair
description: automated program repair that uses semantic code search over large repositories of candidate code bases to produce high-quality bug patches

name: LeakFix
description: safe memory-leak fixing tool for C programs

name: QACrashFix
description: fixing Java crash bugs by querying StackOverflow

name: Kali
description: generate-and-validate patch generation system that only deletes functionality

name: SPR
description: automated program repair tool with condition synthesis

name: MintHint
description: program repair tool that generates repair hints to assist the programmer

name: RSRepair
description: GenProg modification that uses random search

name: Nopol
description: automated program repair tool for conditional expressions

name: AutoFix
description: automatic program repair of object-oriented programs with contracts

name: SemFix
description: automated program repair tool based on symbolic analysis

name: GenProg
description: automated program repair tool based on genetic programming

name: SequenceR
description: SequenceR: SequenceR: Sequence-to-Sequence Learning for End-to-End Program Repair
